para: This is the SD card format used by the Magellan Explorist 400, 500, 600, and XL and internally on those devices plus the Explorist 210. Storeed waypoints are identical to the Magellan SD format used by Meridian, but the newer models allow longer waypoint names. Routes are subtly different.
You should name any file containing waypoints created with this format with a ".upt" extension so the firmware can read it. Similarly, routes should be named ".rte" and tracks should be named ".log".
